Articles.Content:
As pictured below, I thought that this would have been patched out. I was streaming this mission on my twitch channel, where I have the whole vod of numerous bugs still present after the update yesterday.

Just now, Somecallmesteve said:

As pictured below, I thought that this would have been patched out. I was streaming this mission on my twitch channel, where I have the whole vod of numerous bugs still present after the update yesterday.

 

 

https://imgur.com/B1R6oyO

Here's the link to the image. Sorry about that.

To add on to this, even though this is a separate bug, the game doesn't remember the setting I put in for options.

I set it to borderless, and then when I switch screens, it goes back to full screen. What gives?

Oops, meant to say scenes, like if I go from the VAB to either a runway or launchpad.
AFAIK the only thing fixed regarding physics-less part is counting their mass towards the mother parts
